description: Attorneys general from more than 20 states and Washington, D.C. filed a federal lawsuit Tuesday challenging billions of dollars in funding cuts made by the Trump administration that would fund everything from crime prevention to food security to scientific research.

name: Arizona
title: Gov. Hobbs rejects controversial school district accountability bill
description: Gov. Katie Hobbs vetoed a measure that would have caused drastic changes to district leadership if the district is put in state control, saying it was an "overreach."

title: Fair Share supplemental budget passed
description: The supplemental Fair Share budget was signed into law on Tuesday, divvying the millionaire’s tax into two buckets: education and transportation.
